Text: FW Chardonnay Breaks the Butterscotch BarrierHi guys This is an article that ran yesterday in the LA Times and I believe on Sunday in the New York Times by Rod Smith on Chardonnay DG gets a nice mention so I thought Id try to pass it along Let me know if this comes through since its the first time Ive attempted to forward an aritcle Dan Chardonnay Breaks the Butterscotch Barrier Rod Smith February I used to be a staunch ABC man Anything But Chardonnay and Cabernet was my motto I was simply bored with the sameness of the oakflavored grape syrups so many California vintners were producing from the states two predominant varieties The complete article can be viewed at lafebcolumn Visit Latimescom at
